Text: Queen's University Association Football Club is an intermediate, Northern Irish football club playing in the NIFL Premier Intermediate League.
Triplets:<Queen's University Association Football Club
1:
--------------------
Text: Queen's University Belfast A.F.C.:  The club, founded in 1910, a founder member of the Irish League B Division, is affiliated to Queen's University Belfast, and plays home matches at the newly built Arena at the Queen's University sports grounds, Upper Malone, Belfast - also known as "the Dub".
Triplets:<Queen's University Belfast A.F.C.
